entity.name: shop
entity.query: select s.id as id,s.name as name,s.rate as rate,s.cost as cost,CONCAT(lat,',',lng) as store_lat_lng,s.tag as tag,s.addr as addr, s.cat_id as cat_id,c.pid as cat_pid,s.comment_count as comment_count,DATE_FORMAT(s.create_time,'%Y%m%d%H%i%s') AS create_time, s.district_id as district_id,d.pid as district_pid,d.name as district_name,s.status as status from shop s left join shop_cateogry c on s.cat_id = c.id left join district d on s.district_id = d.id where ('${dataimporter.request.clean}' != 'false' OR create_time > '${dataimporter.last_index_time}')
